attributes.action: Find out who would be in favour of re joining the European Union
attributes.additional_details: Find out what proportion of the British population would like to reverse Brexit and rejoin the European Union fully
attributes.background: Find out if the underlying resentment for parliament is due to total dissatisfaction with Brexit and it’s consequences

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700041
